Description:
Responsibilities:

  • Partner with Product and Development teams to capture test case requirements
  • Plan, analyse, write & execute automated test scripts
  • Automate & carry out regression testing scripts using Java with playwright
  • Leverage automated test frameworks to build test suites
  • Investigate problems in software as a result of testing
  • Partner with QA analysts and software developers to find solutions
  • Execute cases, report defects, define severity and prioritize defects

Educational Qualification:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, or related fields
  • FRESHERS CAN ALSO APPLY

Skills & Experience:

  • Hands-on automation experience in frameworks and scripting, preferably in Java with playwright, with the ability to define, design and implement robust, scalable, and high-quality test suites
  • Good knowledge of SQL concepts & Java
  • Sound understanding of automated test frameworks, like TestNG, RestAssured and Playwright
  • Good understanding of API testing both manual and automation
  • Enthusiastic about automating everything to help achieve true CI/CD

Job Responsibilities Include:

  • Develop and debug source code which includes:
    • Write multi-threaded applications that run on embedded or Raspberry PI based systems
    • Interfaces with various peripheral devices; I/O boards, serial communication protocol
    • Requirements collection from internal, external clients and documentation
    • Design, development, optimize, performance tuning of custom applications
    • Unit testing and debugging of applications in various stages of development life cycle
    • Work collaboratively with peers in all the stages of development life cycle
    • Estimate and scope development work
    • Produce documentation of code functionality and features consistently throughout development cycle
    • Participate proactively in requirements analysis and design reviews
    • Perform peer code reviews to discover issues and recommend changes that improves software quality
    • Work with hardware vendors/manufacturers on industrial motherboard, panels, PCBs and control system boards
    • VFD application programming and support
    • Keeping positive attitude and contribute to team effort
    • Perform additional software development duties as required
  • Produce quality software documentation:
    • Design
    • Unit test plans
    • Release notes
  • Assist in testing the developed software and provide support for field problems

Personal Skills:

  • Work as part of a team with minimal supervision
    • Positive, proactive attitude
    • Ability to stay focused on tasks and meet deadlines
  • Excellent problem solving skills

Qualifications Include:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent
  • Proficient in Embedded software development, C/C++ programming
  • Experience with Eclipse IDE and GCC (GNU) compiler

Work Arrangement:

Hybrid

What our Backend Engineers have done:

  • Engineers at Bloomreach are rock-star developers who own and lead the design and development of critical technology components.
  • Bloomreach Product Search - industry-leading eCommerce domain search engine. It is self-learning, has semantic understanding capabilities, and offers advanced personalization features.
  • Bloomreach Recommendations and Pathways - a capability that caters intelligently selected products to individual customers utilizing advanced scalable recommendation algorithms.
  • Distributed and highly scalable content indexing system which caters to some of the largest eCommerce retailers in the world. Read this interesting article for milestones achieved by Bloomreach: https://www.Bloomreach.com/en/news/2020/Bloomreach-hits-major-milestones.html
  • Massively parallel crawler and parser that is able to crawl and index 3,600 QPS (:300 million pages per day).
  • High throughput NoSQL database and search systems which scale for billions of interactions and millions of products (you need this when you are representing 25% of all retail eCommerce experiences in the US and UK)
  • Real-time autocomplete system which provides suggestions faster than the blink of an eye.
  • Distributed, highly scalable, and robust configuration management system which acts as a central repository for all Bloomreach products (because every merchant is different).
  • Suite of automated deployment tools that enable single click E2E testing and multi-system deployment (so everyone else can just worry about code!)
  • Filed multiple patents in areas such as search algorithms, systems, and SEO.
  • Contributor to the Open Source community, be it through code, or community events, or even regular meetups

What you'll bring:

  • A B.Tech/M.Tech or equivalent degree in Computer Science or a related field
  • 1 years of experience building software solutions in a corporate or start up
  • Experience with maintaining distributed systems at significant scale in a production environment
  • Extensive background in algorithms and hands on coding experience
  • Working with backend first languages, such as Java, Scala, Python, etc.
  • Worked with large-scale data processing (e.g. Spark, Hadoop, Mapreduce, Airflow)

Job Overview

We are seeking a motivated Trainee Software Engineer to join our team in Bangalore Urban. This full-time junior position offers the opportunity to develop your skills in a dynamic IT environment. As a trainee, you will work closely with experienced engineers on digital solutions and IT service projects.

Qualifications And Skills

  • Proficiency in Node.js (Mandatory skill) is essential to execute backend development tasks effectively and efficiently.
  • Strong understanding of JavaScript (Mandatory skill), enabling seamless integration and development of various applications.
  • Experience with powerapps (Mandatory skill) to support the development of enterprise-level applications swiftly and accurately.
  • Familiarity with React.js, allowing you to construct user interfaces and enhance user experience through component-based architecture.
  • Understanding of lowcode/nocode platforms, permitting rapid application development without extensive coding requirements.
  • Ability to work in a team environment, exhibiting excellent communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
  • Eagerness to learn and grow within the IT services industry, showing adaptability and a proactive approach to problem-solving.
  • Basic knowledge of IT services and operations, supporting your ability to integrate new technologies into existing systems effectively.

Roles And Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with senior software engineers to develop and implement backend solutions using Node.js.
  • Assist in creating seamless user interfaces with JavaScript and React.js, enhancing the overall user experience.
  • Contribute to the design and development of enterprise applications using powerapps and lowcode/nocode platforms.
  • Participate in team meetings and project discussions, providing insights and learning from experienced professionals.
  • Participate in the troubleshooting and debugging processes to ensure optimal application performance and reliability.
  • Stay updated with the latest industry trends and incorporate them into practice to streamline development processes.
  • Assist with maintaining and documenting technical specifications, ensuring accuracy and compliance with industry standards.
  • Contribute to the company's research and development initiatives, exploring innovative solutions to enhance service delivery.

Responsibilities

React Development :

  • Utilize your experience with Next.js and React to contribute to the development and enhancement of web applications.
  • Collaborate with the team to implement efficient and maintainable code using React.js and Redux as required.

JavaScript, HTML5, And CSS Mastery

  • Demonstrate a solid understanding of JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS to create responsive and visually appealing user interfaces.
  • Ensure cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness of web applications.

Browser-based Debugging And Performance Testing

  • Utilize your proficiency in browser-based debugging techniques to identify and resolve issues in the codebase.
  • Conduct performance testing and optimization to enhance the overall user experience.

User Interface Design And Wireframing

  • Apply your experience in user interface design to contribute creative and user-friendly solutions.
  • Utilize technical design and wireframing tools to translate concepts into tangible and visually appealing designs.

Git And Agile Development Practices

  • Work with Git for version control, ensuring the integrity and collaboration of the codebase.
  • Contribute to Agile development practices, participating in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and sprint reviews.

Requirements

  • Solid understanding of JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS
  • Experience with Typescript is good to have.
  • Proficiency with browser-based debugging and performance testing
  • Experience with user interface design, technical design, and wireframing tools
  • Familiarity with Git and Agile development practices
  • Bachelor's degree or higher in computer science or a related field would be beneficial but not required
  • Proficiency with frontend AI based vibe coding is an additional plus.

Key Responsibilities

  • Assist in the design, development, and maintenance of software applications
  • Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code using modern programming languages (e.g., Java, Python, C#, etc.)
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, testers, and product manager,s to implement new features and functionalities
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve software defects and issues
  • Participate in code reviews and follow best coding practices
  • Stay updated with the latest technologies, programming languages, and development trends
  • Contribute to improving the software development process by suggesting improvements

Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree in computer science, information technology, or a related field (or equivalent experience)
  • Familiarity with at least one programming language such as Java, Python, C++, or JavaScript
  • Basic understanding of object-oriented programming and software development principles
  • Strong problem-solving skills and an ability to learn quickly
  • Good communication and teamwork skills
  • Familiarity with version control systems like Git is a plus
  • Exposure to cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud
  • Understanding of databases (SQL/NoSQL)
  • Familiarity with Agile methodologies
  • Knowledge of front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

About the job

We're looking for a creative Front-end Developer to bring innovative, visually appealing web interfaces to life. In this role, you'll use modern web technologies to craft delightful, responsive user experiences while collaborating closely with a supportive design team. If you love blending art with code and making the web a brighter place, we'd love to hear from you!

Responsibilities

  • Collaborate joyfully with designers and team members to create engaging, pixel-perfect user interfaces.
  • Write clean, efficient, and accessible code that brings our creative ideas to life on the web.
  • Keep our websites responsive and fun on every device, ensuring a delightful experience for everyone.
  • Integrate seamlessly with back-end services, making data flow effortlessly and securely.
  • Stay curious and explore the latest front-end trends to keep our projects fresh and innovative.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve any issues with a proactive, can-do spirit that keeps our users smiling.
  • Share your insights and work collaboratively to continuously improve our digital experience.

Qualifications

  • Passionate about designing user-friendly and visually engaging web experiences.
  • Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with modern frameworks like React or Vue.
  • Always eager to learn and stay up-to-date with the latest front-end trends.
  • Comfortable collaborating with designers and back-end developers to bring ideas to life.
  • Experienced in creating responsive, performance-optimized layouts for all devices.
  • Dedicated to writing clean, maintainable code with attention to detail.
  • Excited to contribute creative solutions and a positive, team-oriented spirit.

Key Responsibilities

  • Develop web applications using React and Redux
  • Integrate backend services
  • Collaborate with the team to manage optimize and customize multiple web applications
  • Create and maintain technical documentation
  • Design insightful dashboards for clients
  • Create APIs and API documentation for front-end developers
  • Work with development teams and product managers to ideate software solutions
  • Design client-side and server-side architecture
  • Build the front-end of applications through appealing visual design
  • Develop and manage well-functioning databases and applications
  • Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency
  • Troubleshoot debug and upgrade software
  • Create security and data protection settings
  • Build features and applications with a mobile responsive design
  • Write technical documentation
  • Collaborate with data scientists and analysts to improve software

Key Responsibilities

  • Designing and Developing ML Systems: This involves creating the architecture and infrastructure for machine learning models and pipelines.
  • Implementing ML Algorithms: ML engineers translate data science models and algorithms into functional code, often using frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.
  • Performing Statistical Analyses: They use statistical methods to analyze data, evaluate model performance, and improve the overall system.
  • Conducting Experiments: They design and execute experiments to test and refine ML models, ensuring they meet performance requirements.
  • Model Deployment: ML engineers deploy models into production environments, making them accessible and functional for real-world use cases.
  • Monitoring and Maintaining Systems: They monitor the performance of deployed models and maintain the systems to ensure optimal functionality.
  • Data Preparation: This includes cleaning, transforming, and preparing data for model training, ensuring data quality and relevance.
  • Model Evaluation: They assess model performance using various metrics to ensure accuracy, efficiency, and reliability.
  • Collaboration: They work closely with data scientists, software engineers, and other stakeholders to achieve project goals.
